name: 余琬琴
objective: The course covers the following topics: (1) the structure and function of amino acids, proteins, carbohydrates, nucleotides and nucleic acids. (2) DNA-Based Information Technologies
schedule:
1.  Introduction  
2.  Amino Acids, Peptides, and Proteins
3.  Amino Acids, Peptides, and Proteins
4.  Protein Structure and Function
5.  Protein Structure and Function
6.  Enzymes
7.  Enzymes
8. Enzymes
9.  Review
10.  Carbohydrates
11.  Nucleotides and Nucleic Acids
12.  Nucleotides and Nucleic Acids
13.  DNA-Based Information Technologies
14.  DNA-Based Information Technologies
15.  DNA-Based Information Technologies
16. Student presentation
17. Student presentation
18. Review
scorePolicy:
Homework: 60%
Attendance and participation: 20%
Oral presentation: 20%
materials:
Lehninger Principles of Biochemistry by Nelson and Cox, 7th Ed, Macmillan (合記圖書）
Journal papers
